features: 📷【Multifunctional Printed Camera】Children's camera not only supports 24MP original shooting, 1080P video recording and playback,but also has burst shooting, time-lapse photos,16x magnification zoom,8 mirror effects,18 photo frames, 5 filters and a music player, 4 puzzle games ect. Help kids capture beautiful moments & become life writers.

【Safe Instant Camera for Kids】The digital instant camera uses the inkless thermal printing technology, you can easily take photos without adding inkm. 3 rolls of printing paper each roll of thermal paper can print about 75 photos. We provide stickers and colour pen for kids to decorate black and white photos, can stimulate their imagination and creativity.

【32G Memory Card and 1000mAh battery】Children's digital camera with a rechargeable 1000mAh battery supports 3-4H use. The instant cameras included 32G memory card compatible with computers, laptops and other devices with USB port.files can be transferred via the USB cable and card reader.

👪 【Fantasy Creativity and DIY Colouring】Children can choose their favourite special effect filters, photo frames or special effects to take pictures, and then decorate and colour the printed photos with crayons, encourage creativity and imagination and make them explore the world.

🎁【An ideal gift for kids】The instant camera for kids is suitable for children aged 3 to 14 years old and is perfect for boys and girls as a birthday gift, Christmas gift and Children's Day gift. Kids can use it to take selfies, record vlogs and capture every moment of life. Print black and white photos for kids to draw DIY.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WEEFUN Instant Printed Kids Camera with 16X Digital Zoom, 32GB TF Card, Colour Pens Capture the beauty of life in a more interesting way We are committed to providing a happy childhood for all children. Protect your child's growth and enjoy taking photos and DIY photos in a non-toxic environment. This printed camera toy is more educational and interactive, photography, painting, music, video and games are children's favourite entertainment, we put them together to stimulate children's desire and interest in photography. As a birthday gift, Christmas gift and Children's Day gift, it can be a great surprise. Warm tips: 1. it is recommended to use a high quality class 10 micro SD card that supports a maximum of 32GB in FAT 32 format. 2. do not disconnect the USB connection or unplug the micro SD card while downloading files from the camera. 3. do not recommend using the camera when it is charged. 4. when the camera fill light is on, do not point it at the child's eyes to avoid injury. 5. if the camera cannot print, please check that the paper is loaded correctly and that the print mode is on.

✔ One-click shooting, instant printing, funnier! ✔ 24MP photos pixels, 1520P videos camera ✔ Original photography, video recording, playback, continuous shooting ✔ 3 rolls of BPA-free printing paper, health and safety ✔ 32G memory card, can store many pictures and videos ✔ Type-C cable supports data transfer and fast charging ✔ Comes with a neck strap, easy to carry ✔Keep kids away from cell phones, help them discover the world, and make it easy to photograph and capture colorful childhoods. ✔ Thermal printing technology lets you easily take photos without adding ink. Instant printing, more fun! What's in the box? ✔ Kids Print Camera x 1 ; ✔ Print Paper Roll x 3; ✔ Memory Card x 1； ✔ Type-C x 1; ✔ Lanyard x 1; ✔ User Manual x 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best camera option for a young boy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my nephew, he loves it! Big win for aunt. The paper option for photos is super cost effective and perfect for a seven year old. Really nicely detailed pictures, get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old absolutely loves this! It’s easy to use and so much fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this so much. My just turned 9 year old LOVES it. Multiples of us have the Instax Mini cameras, and he really enjoys the automatic picture print option. Well, he's 9 and I don't know if I want to spend that much $ on something quite yet I feel may be dropped. This camera is the perfect option for him. It has a carrier option for traveling with it around his neck, and it does have an automatic print feature as well as internal storage (probably won't use the internal). He's very happy with it and so am I! Can't beat the price, AND it's small for younger kids and stylish. My middle now wants one! Came with 3 rolls (one in the camera) and 2 on the side. I also ordered extra rolls, as well as a little storage container for it. The only thing you all need that isnt available yet is a little album to store the pictures! For now we are using a zip lock baggy. I'm so pleased. We got the white color BTW. Get this for you or your kids, they will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my four-year-old granddaughter at Christmas time. It was a big hit! I’m pleasantly surprised at how durable it is. She’s dropped it several times and it still works perfectly. This camera is very easy for her to use. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The camera was easy enough to set up and my daughter likes the print quality. However, the camera software freezes almost constantly and the screen and buttons are unresponsive. Sometimes, I can turn it off and back on and it will work for a few more minutes before it freezes again. But sometimes, even the power button doesn't work and we have to wait for the battery to die since that's the only way to turn it off. Then we charge it again and we're lucky if it works for an hour before freezing again. Terrible product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product for kids
reviews.reviewText: Amazing. The kids love it and the whole family is able to enjoy the photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instant print camera with video and all extras
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing gift for kids. My grandson said he doesn't get pictures that he wants to keep, only his mom. So got his this for Christmas and he's taking pictures and video's and printing out the ones he wants to keep. Really good quality. Great price also. Thanks
